dpi.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a way of measuring how much ink is put on the page by a printer
dpi.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a measure of how clear the details of an image produced by a printer, scanner etc are. The more dots there are per inch, the clearer the image
dpi.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Laser printers are typically 300 to 600 DPI and commercial typesetters are usually around 1200 DPI.
